name: Reaction Mechanism Generator
body:
### The new version of RMG, written in Python

* Documentation: http://reactionmechanismgenerator.github.io/RMG-Py/
* Source code and issues: https://github.com/ReactionMechanismGenerator/RMG-Py

### Interactive website with database and utilities.
* Site: http://rmg.mit.edu/   or  http://rmg.coe.neu.edu/ (mirror, usually with different version)
* Source code and issues: https://github.com/ReactionMechanismGenerator/RMG-website

### The previous version of RMG, written in Java
* Documentation: http://rmg.sourceforge.net
* Source code and issues: https://github.com/ReactionMechanismGenerator/RMG-Java

More coming soon.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
